info.title: Xibo API
info.description:
Xibo CMS API.
       Using HTTP formData requests.
       All PUT requests require Content-Type:application/x-www-form-urlencoded header.

get.description: Search all Campaigns this user has access to

parameters.name: campaignId
parameters.description: Filter by Campaign Id

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filter by Name

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Filter by Tags

parameters.name: exactTags
parameters.description: A flag indicating whether to treat the tags filter as an exact match

parameters.name: logicalOperator
parameters.description: When filtering by multiple Tags, which logical operator should be used? AND|OR

parameters.name: hasLayouts
parameters.description: Filter by has layouts

parameters.name: isLayoutSpecific
parameters.description: Filter by whether this Campaign is specific to a Layout or User added

parameters.name: retired
parameters.description: Filter by retired

parameters.name: totalDuration
parameters.description: Should we total the duration?

parameters.name: embed
parameters.description: Embed related data such as layouts, permissions, tags and events

parameters.name: folderId
parameters.description: Filter by Folder ID

post.description: Add a Campaign

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of campaign, either list|ad

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name for this Campaign

parameters.name: folderId
parameters.description: Folder ID to which this object should be assigned to

parameters.name: layoutIds
parameters.description: An array of layoutIds to assign to this Campaign, in order.

parameters.name: cyclePlaybackEnabled
parameters.description:
When cycle based playback is enabled only 1 Layout from this Campaign will be played each time
     * it is in a Schedule loop. The same Layout will be shown until the 'Play count' is achieved.

parameters.name: playCount
parameters.description: In cycle based playback, how many plays should each Layout have before moving on?

parameters.name: listPlayOrder
parameters.description: In layout list, how should campaigns in the schedule with the same play order be played?

parameters.name: targetType
parameters.description: For ad campaigns, how do we measure the target? plays|budget

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: For ad campaigns, what is the target count for playback over the entire campaign

parameters.description: The DataSet Name

parameters.description: A description of this DataSet

parameters.description: A code for this DataSet

parameters.name: isRemote
parameters.description: Is this a remote DataSet?

parameters.name: method
parameters.description: The Request Method GET or POST

parameters.name: uri
parameters.description: The URI, without query parameters

parameters.name: postData
parameters.description: query parameter encoded data to add to the request

parameters.name: authentication
parameters.description: HTTP Authentication method None|Basic|Digest

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: HTTP Authentication User Name

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: HTTP Authentication Password

parameters.name: customHeaders
parameters.description: Comma separated string of custom HTTP headers

parameters.name: userAgent
parameters.description: Custom user Agent value

parameters.name: refreshRate
parameters.description: How often in seconds should this remote DataSet be refreshed

parameters.name: clearRate
parameters.description: How often in seconds should this remote DataSet be truncated

parameters.name: truncateOnEmpty
parameters.description: Should the DataSet data be truncated even if no new data is pulled from the source?

parameters.name: runsAfter
parameters.description: An optional dataSetId which should be run before this Remote DataSet

parameters.name: dataRoot
parameters.description: The root of the data in the Remote source which is used as the base for all remote columns

parameters.name: summarize
parameters.description: Should the data be aggregated? None|Summarize|Count

parameters.name: summarizeField
parameters.description: Which field should be used to summarize

parameters.name: sourceId
parameters.description: For remote DataSet, what type data is it? 1 - json, 2 - csv

parameters.name: ignoreFirstRow
parameters.description: For remote DataSet with sourceId 2 (CSV), should we ignore first row?

parameters.name: rowLimit
parameters.description: For remote DataSet, maximum number of rows this DataSet can hold, if left empty the CMS Setting for DataSet row limit will be used.

parameters.name: limitPolicy
parameters.description: For remote DataSet, what should happen when the DataSet row limit is reached? stop, fifo or truncate

parameters.name: csvSeparator
parameters.description: Separator that should be used when using Remote DataSets with CSV source, comma will be used by default.

parameters.name: folderId
parameters.description: Folder ID to which this object should be assigned to

post.description: Import a CSV into a DataSet

parameters.name: dataSetId
parameters.description: The DataSet ID to import into.

parameters.name: files
parameters.description: The file

parameters.name: csvImport_{dataSetColumnId}
parameters.description: You need to provide dataSetColumnId after csvImport_, to know your dataSet columns Ids, you will need to use the GET /dataset/{dataSetId}/column call first. The value of this parameter is the index of the column in your csv file, where the first column is 1

parameters.name: overwrite
parameters.description: flag (0,1) Set to 1 to erase all content in the dataSet and overwrite it with new content in this import

parameters.name: ignorefirstrow
parameters.description: flag (0,1), Set to 1 to Ignore first row, useful if the CSV file has headings

post.description: Import JSON into a DataSet

parameters.name: dataSetId
parameters.description: The DataSet ID to import into.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: The row data, field name vs field data format. e.g. { uniqueKeys: [col1], rows: [{col1: value1}]}
